When user clicks "Delete Appointment" from home page and a appointment is selected.

When user clicks "Delete Customer" from home page and a customer is selected.
setDescriptionLabelForAppointmentWithin15(Appointment) - Method in class controllers.notification_error
Method is ran when user successfully logs in and and their is an appointment within 15 minutes.
setDescriptionLabelForDeleteCustomerError(List<Integer>) - Method in class controllers.notification_error
Method is ran when user selects a customer from home page that has appointments and clicks "Delete Customer".
setDescriptionLabelForOverLappingAppointments(Appointment) - Method in class controllers.notification_error
Method is ran when user picks a time for a customer with an appointment during the same time.
setHomeLabels(Label) - Static method in class utility.errorBoxes
This method is ran once during the initialize method of "home_controller".
setNextFocusOnTabPress(Node, Node) - Method in class controllers.login_controller
When user is interacting with the login page they can click the tab button it will move to the next button in the most logical way.

Populates the Reports Table Page.

SQL_deletes - Class in utility
The SQL_deletes class contains methods for deleting a Customer or an Appointment from the database.

The SQL_inserts class contains methods for inserting a Customer or an Appointment into the database.

The SQL_queries class contains methods for running queries and collecting data from tables in the database.

The SQL_updates class contains methods for updating a Customer or an Appointment in the database.
